translations: 破坏，毁灭；杀死，人道毁灭（受伤、生病或危险的动物）；彻底打败，击溃；毁掉……的生活，使垮掉

sentences.sentence: Any reform will destroy and pervert our constitution.
sentences.translation: 任何改革都将破坏、败坏我们的宪法。

sentences.sentence: He said army officers had threatened to destroy the town.
sentences.translation: 他说军官们已威胁要摧毁这座小镇。

sentences.sentence: The company produces chemicals that destroy ticks and mites.
sentences.translation: 该公司生产消灭壁虱和螨虫的化学品。
